markdownRemark.html: Situated in Chiclana, only 2.7 kilometres from the beach and the Meliá Sancti Petri hotel. With wide fairways and good greens, this golf course is interesting with water and two excellent closing holes. It is also an easy walk and buggies are not.

frontmatter.title: La Estancia Golf
frontmatter.description: La Estancia Golf - Situated in Chiclana, only 2.7 kilometres from the beach and the Meliá Sancti Petri hotel. With wide fairways and good greens, this golf course is interesting with water and two excellent closing holes. It is also an easy walk and buggies are not necessary.
frontmatter.address: Colada de Fuenteamarga, Campano 11130 Chiclana de la Frontera, Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 77.00 euros, Highest green fee weekends 77.00 euros
